data.message:
Didn't even know, but all you give to the show
Just gives me another motivation that always keep my head up
You know, struggling alone is something that nobody want it
But your rhymes like coffee and sugar with caffeine mixed with no brand made my brain being washed
Cause I thought my life just will be a horseshit and always thinking about committing suicide then
I heard your "cleaning out my closet"  while clowning in my boredom and sitting immedeately changed what I believed in

replies.message: yo, tanpa embel embel kau teriakiku juga gembel, dasar anak wewe gombel, sini kau mulut ku gobel

Ain't need no more cowbell, seharusnya bahasa bisa disetel
Jangab kaya tukang ngepel, asal tempel
Kaidah dimana bumi dipijak langit dijunjung ain't stirred well
Sit down christropher reeves, i thought you were in hell
